pageSetting.title: 职能部室考核得分明细查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select yyjg.khnf, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '第'||cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, fapz.famc, wdmb.wdmc, khxmpz.xmmc, khxmpz.mf, yyjg.yyjg from znbs_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join znbs_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join znbs_khxmpz khxmpz on khxmpz.fabh=yyjg.fabh and yyjg.xmbh=khxmpz.xmbh inner join znbs_wdmb wdmb on wdmb.wdbh=khxmpz.wdbh inner join khdx_jg khjg on fapz.znbs=khjg.khdxdh where 1=1 and yyjg.khnf=$khnd$ and yyjg.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$fabh$ and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) order by wdmb.wdmc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select yyjg.khnf, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when yyjg.khzq=1 then cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when yyjg.khzq=2 then '第'||cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8) )|| '季度' else cast(yyjg.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, fapz.famc, wdmb.wdmc, khxmpz.xmmc, khxmpz.mf, yyjg.yyjg from znbs_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join znbs_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join znbs_khxmpz khxmpz on khxmpz.fabh=yyjg.fabh and yyjg.xmbh=khxmpz.xmbh inner join znbs_wdmb wdmb on wdmb.wdbh=khxmpz.wdbh inner join khdx_jg khjg on fapz.znbs=khjg.khdxdh where 1=1 and yyjg.khnf=$khnd$ and yyjg.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$fabh$ and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) order by wdmb.wdmc ) t
